IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: IT IS THE MISSION OF PEOPLE ENCOURAGING PEOPLE, INC. TO PROVIDE EXEMPLARY REHABILITATION AND SUPPORT SERVICES TO INDIVIDUALS WITH PSYCHIATRIC OR OTHER DISABLING CONDITIONS. PEP OFFERS SERVICES THAT ARE HIGHLY INDIVIDUALIZED, COMMUNITY BASED AND DESIGNED TO FOSTER A HEALTHY LEVEL OF INTERDEPENDENCE BETWEEN THOSE INDIVIDUALS AND THEIR COMMUNITY.
IRS990.MissionDesc: IT IS THE MISSION OF PEOPLE ENCOURAGING PEOPLE, INC. TO PROVIDE EXEMPLARY REHABILITATION AND SUPPORT SERVICES TO INDIVIDUALS WITH PSYCHIATRIC OR OTHER DISABLING CONDITIONS. PEP OFFERS SERVICES THAT ARE HIGHLY INDIVIDUALIZED, COMMUNITY BASED AND DESIGNED TO FOSTER A HEALTHY LEVEL OF INTERDEPENDENCE BETWEEN THOSE INDIVIDUALS AND THEIR COMMUNITY.
IRS990.Desc: TO PROVIDE REHABILITATION, SOCIAL EXPERIENCE, EDUCATION, TRAINING, & EMPLOYMENT TO APPROXIMATELY 1,600 CHRONICALLY MENTALLY ILL & OTHER FUNCTIONALLY DISABLED ADULTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: WE ARE THE REPRESENTATIVE PAYEE FOR SOCIAL SECURITY CHECKS FOR MANY OF OUR CLIENTS. WE MAINTAIN A SEPARATE BANK ACCOUNT AND DISBURSE THE PROCEEDS ON A MONTHLY BASIS. WE HAVE A FIDUCIARY RESPONSIBILITY TO MANAGE THE CLIENTS MONEY ON THEIR BEHALF AND IN THEIR BEST INTEREST. WE DO THIS ON BEHALF OF THE CLIENTS WITHOUT CHARGING ANY FEE.

THE ORGANIZATION ACCOUNTS FOR TAX PROVISIONS IN ACCORDANCE WITH FINANCIAL ACCOUNT STANDARDS BOARD ACCOUNTING STANDARDS CONCEPT TOPIC 740-10, ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES, WHICH CREATES A SINGLE MODEL TO ADDRESS UNCERTAINTY IN TAX POSITIONS AND CLARIFIES THE ACCOUNTING FOR INCOME TAXES BY PRESCRIBING THE MINIMUM RECOGNITION THRESHOLD A TAX POSITION IS REQUIRED TO MEET BEFORE BEING RECOGNIZED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE ORGANIZATION BELIEVES THAT ITS INCOME TAX FILING POSITIONS AND DEDUCTIONS WILL BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATION AND, ACCORDINGLY, HAS NOT RECORDED ANY RESERVES, OR RELATED ACCRUALS FOR INTEREST AND PENALTIES, AT JUNE 30, 2018 AND 2017 FOR UNCERTAIN INCOME TAX POSITIONS. THE ORGANIZATIONS CONTINUALLY EVALUATES EXPIRING STATUTES OF LIMITATIONS, AUDITS, PROPOSED SETTLEMENTS, CHANGES IN TAX LAW, AND NEW AUTHORITATIVE RULINGS. THE ORGANIZATIONS HAVE ADOPTED A POLICY UNDER WHICH, IF REQUIRED TO BE RECOGNIZED IN THE FUTURE, WILL CLASSIFY INTEREST RELATED TO THE UNDERPAYMENT OF INCOME TAXES AS A COMPONENT OF INTEREST EXPENSE, AND WILL CLASSIFY ANY RELATED PENALTIES IN ADMINISTRATIVE AND GENERAL EXPENSES IN THE CONSOLIDATED STATEMENTS OF FUNCTIONAL EXPENSES AND STATEMENTS OF ACTIVITIES. WITH FEW EXCEPTIONS, THE ORGANIZATION IS NO LONGER SUBJECT TO U.S. FEDERAL, STATE AND LOCAL INCOME TAX EXAMINATIONS BY TAX AUTHORITIES FOR YEARS ENDING BEFORE JUNE 30, 2015.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS DISTRIBUTED TO BOARD MEMBERS AND VOTED UPON AT THE BOARD MEETING. A FISCAL PRESENTATION PRECEDES THE VOTE WHERE ANY QUESTIONS OR CONCERNS ARE ADDRESSED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ANY BOARD MEMBER FOUND TO HAVE A TEMPORARY CONFLICT OF INTEREST IS ASKED TO TAKE A LEAVE OF ABSENCE OR ASKED TO RESIGN IF THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST IS PERMANENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE COMPENSATION FOR THE CEO WAS RECOMMENDED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS BY THE COMPENSATION COMMITTEE, BASED UPON COMPENSATION INFORMATION FROM AN INDEPENDENT COMPENSATION CONSULTANT, AND COMPENSATION INFORMATION FROM THE CHIEF ADMINISTRATIVE OFFICER. COMPENSATION WAS THEN SUBJECT TO THE APPROVAL OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
